question: Was Fadak gifted to Fatima A.S. by the Holy Prophet S.A.W.? Why was it taken away from her after the death of the Holy Prophet S.A.W.?
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
Fadak was not gifted to Hadhrat Faatima (Radhiallaahu Anha) by Rasulullah
(Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam)

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
